Summary: Saw what I thought was an unusualmoon, itwas in the wrong sky (West), had folks from inside come out to look , we all saw it
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Silverton
There were no other sightings in Silverton on or around October 19th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsHad just finished dinner and went outside and saw what at first i thought was a quarter moon, went in a tolk the five i was dining withto come out and lookat the strange moon, it did not seem to be moving, and was oposite shake of quarter moon, in a minute or so, it appeared like a ball, and another minute like a quarter moonagain, then in 15-20 seconds more it jus dissappeared. It was not cloudy a,d it was very high, the mountains here at 13k+ and it was wayup (looked like a quarter moon)
